import { useState } from 'react' import TextInput from './TextInput' import SubmitButton from './SubmitButton' function RegisterForm ({ onSubmit }) { const [credentials, setCredentials] = useState({ email: 'foo@bar.fr', firstName: 'Bastien', lastName: 'Dupond', username: 'BastienDu78', password: 'azerty123' }) const handleChange = (event) => { const inputName = event.target.name const inputValue = event.target.value setCredentials({ ...credentials, [inputName]: inputValue }) } const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() onSubmit(credentials) } return ( <>

Inscription






) } export default RegisterForm
